title: Chapter 1: Grounding
description: Sit quietly and ground yourself before drawing.

title: Chapter 2: Past Landmark
description: Recall a past health feeling or memory. Draw what you feel, and add a date.

title: Chapter 3: Current Landmark
description: Focus on your current health sensation. Sketch what you notice, and add today's date.

title: Chapter 4: Optimal Hope
description: Imagine your optimal health state. Draw your wish. Add a follow-up date.
